name: CITY OF MIRAMAR, FLORIDA
sampleDescriptions: Support for NEA "Our Town" grant application.
Seeking to maintain tax free municipal bonds.  Support for Market Place Fairness Act.

Seeking funding in the Fiscal Year 2018 and 2019 Transportation and Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Bills for roadway and transit improvements; and for the Community Development Block Gra
Seeking to delay or modify the proposed waters of the U.S. rule. Support for canal bank stabilization and water infrastructure.  Seeking assistance to mitigate blasting disturbance.
